entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Val Marie
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 3:34 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -10.3°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Val Marie 03:00 AM CST Friday 10 March 2023
Temperature: -10.3°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 85 %
Wind Chill: -20
Dewpoint: -12.3°C
Wind: SE 28 km/h gust 37 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 18. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50. Low minus 18. Wind chill minus 30 this evening and minus 23 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Snow and blowing snow. High minus 7.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near noon. Blowing snow late in the afternoon. Amount 5 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60. High minus 7. Wind chill minus 23 in the morning and minus 16 in the afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Snow at times heavy and blowing snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy. Blowing snow early in the evening. Amount 10 to 20 cm. Wind east 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 in the evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill near minus 19. Forecast issued 4:00 PM CST Thursday 09 March 2023
